Class ThingDTOMapper

  • java.lang.Object

    EnrichedThingDTOMapper

    public class ThingDTOMapper
extends Object
    The ThingDTOMapper is an utility class to map things into data transfer objects (DTO).
    Author:
    Stefan Bu√üweiler - Initial contribution, Kai Kreuzer - Added DTO to Thing mapping
